venue.name: Cambridge Public Library, Central Square Branch

item.description: At this inaugural session of the New England Poetry Club Winter 2007 Poetry Series, ROSANNA WARREN, painter, translator, prize-winning poet, and past Chancellor of the Academy of American Poets, introduces this year?s recipient of The New England Poetry Club Golden Rose : DAVID FERRY, award-winning poet and translator who has also been a finalist for the National Book Critics Circle Award, the New Yorker Book Award for Poetry, and the PEN New England/Winship Award. At the Cambridge Public Library, Central Square Branch, No. 45 Pearl Street at Massachusetts Avenue. Next to the parking garage. For more information, please call 617-744-6034. Free and open to the public.
item.name: David Ferry receives the Golden Rose
